Title: Visit Name
Description: Visit name: M - in months, SC - screening visit, LOG - records without visit; #2 or #3 define repated records at the same visit or repeated visit

Title: Visit Month
Description: Numeric visit in months; for visits prior baseline -1, -2 is an order of screening visits

Title: BRAAK stage neurofibrillary tangle
Description: BRAAK stage for neurofibrillary tangle pathology

Title: BRAAK stage Lewy body
Description: BRAAK stage for Lewy body pathology

Title: DLB probability
Description: Likelihood of DLB based on McKeith criteria
UniqueValues: Low Likelihood; Intermediate Likelihood; High Likelihood; NA
